00027 // wxWidgets < 2.5.4 compatibility.
00028 // TODO: After officially included in library, remove this section.
00029 #if wxMINOR_VERSION < 5 || ( wxMINOR_VERSION == 5 && wxRELEASE_NUMBER < 3 )
00030 # if wxUSE_UNICODE
00031     #include <string.h> //for mem funcs
00032 
00033     inline wxChar* wxTmemcpy(wxChar* szOut, const wxChar* szIn, size_t len)
00034     {
00035         return (wxChar*) memcpy(szOut, szIn, len * sizeof(wxChar));
00036     }
00037 # else
00038     #define wxTmemcpy memcpy
00039 # endif
00040 # ifndef wxFIXED_MINSIZE
00041 #  define wxFIXED_MINSIZE    0
00042 # endif
00043 #elif ( wxMINOR_VERSION == 5 && wxRELEASE_NUMBER < 4 )
00044     #define wxTmemcpy wxMemcpy
00045 #endif

00050 // This is required for sharing common global variables.
00051 // TODO: Automatic locking mechanism?
00052 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxPGGlobalVarsClass
00053 {
00054 public:
00055 
00056     wxPGGlobalVarsClass();
00057     ~wxPGGlobalVarsClass();
00058 
00059     wxString            m_pDefaultImageWildcard; // Used by advprops, but here to make things easier.
00060 
00061     wxArrayPtrVoid      m_arrEditorClasses; // List of editor class instances.
00062 
00063     wxPGHashMapS2P      m_dictValueType; // Valuename -> Value type object instance.
00064 
00065     wxPGHashMapS2P      m_dictPropertyClassInfo; // PropertyName -> ClassInfo
00066 
00067     // void* so we don't have to declare class in headers
00068     void*               m_dictConstants;
00069 
00070     wxString            m_boolChoices[2]; // default is ["False", "True"]
00071 
00072     wxPGConstants       m_emptyConstants;
00073 
00074     bool                m_autoGetTranslation; // If true then some things are automatically translated
00075 
00076     int                 m_offline; // > 0 if errors cannot or should not be shown in statusbar etc.
00077 };
00078 
00079 extern WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxPGGlobalVarsClass* wxPGGlobalVars;
00080 
00081 #define wxPGUnRefChoices(PCHOICES) \
00082     wxASSERT ( PCHOICES ); \
00083     if ( PCHOICES != &wxPGGlobalVars->m_emptyConstants && PCHOICES->UnRef() ) \
00084         delete PCHOICES

00148 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_EDITOR_CLASS_CONSTFUNC(EDITOR,CLASSNAME,PARENTCLASS) \
00149 wxPGEditor* wxPGEditor_##EDITOR = (wxPGEditor*) NULL; \
00150 wxPGEditor* wxPGConstruct##EDITOR##EditorClass() \
00151 { \
00152     wxASSERT ( !wxPGEditor_##EDITOR ); \
00153     return new CLASSNAME(); \
00154 }
00155 
00156 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_EDITOR_CLASS_STD_METHODS() \
00157 virtual wxPGCtrlClass* CreateControls ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGProperty* property, \
00158     const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& sz, wxPGCtrlClass** psecondary ) const; \
00159 virtual void UpdateControl ( wxPGProperty* property, wxPGCtrlClass* ctrl ) const; \
00160 virtual bool OnEvent ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGProperty* property, \
00161     wxPGCtrlClass* primary, wxEvent& event ) const; \
00162 virtual bool CopyValueFromControl ( wxPGProperty* property, wxPGCtrlClass* ctrl ) const; \
00163 virtual void SetValueToUnspecified ( wxPGCtrlClass* ctrl ) const;

00166 class CLASSNAME; \
00167 class CLASSNAME : public PARENTCLASS \
00168 { \
00169 public: \
00170     virtual ~CLASSNAME(); \
00171     WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_EDITOR_CLASS_STD_METHODS() \
00172 }; \
00173 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_EDITOR_CLASS_CONSTFUNC(EDITOR,CLASSNAME,PARENTCLASS)

00180 #if wxPG_EMBED_VARIANT
00181 # define wxPG_SetVariantValue(VALUE) \
00182     ((wxVariant&)*this) = VALUE
00183 # define wxPG_SetVariantWxObjectValue() \
00184     ((wxVariant&)*this) = wxVariant((wxObject*)DoGetValue().GetRawPtr(),m_name);
00185 # define wxPG_SetVariantValueVoidPtr() \
00186     ((wxVariant&)*this) = wxPGVariantToVoidPtr(DoGetValue())
00187 #else
00188 # define wxPG_SetVariantValue(VALUE)            { }
00189 # define wxPG_SetVariantWxObjectValue()         { }
00190 # define wxPG_SetVariantValueVoidPtr()          { }
00191 #endif

00193 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 // Value type registeration macros
00195 
00196 #define wxPGRegisterValueType(TYPENAME) \
00197     if ( wxPGValueType_##TYPENAME == (wxPGValueType*) NULL ) \
00198     { \
00199         wxPGValueType_##TYPENAME = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterValueType( new wxPGValueType##TYPENAME##Class ); \
00200     }
00201 
00202 // Use this in RegisterDefaultValues.
00203 #define wxPGRegisterDefaultValueType(TYPENAME) \
00204     if ( wxPGValueType_##TYPENAME == (wxPGValueType*) NULL ) \
00205     { \
00206         wxPGValueType_##TYPENAME = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterValueType( new wxPGValueType##TYPENAME##Class, TRUE ); \
00207     }
00208 
00209 #define wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_TYPE(T) \
00210     wxPGRegisterValueType(T)
00211 
00212 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00213 // Editor class registeration macros
00214 
00215 #define wxPGRegisterEditorClass(EDITOR) \
00216     if ( wxPGEditor_##EDITOR == (wxPGEditor*) NULL ) \
00217     { \
00218         wxPGEditor_##EDITOR = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterEditorClass( wxPGConstruct##EDITOR##EditorClass() ); \
00219     }
00220 
00221 // Use this in RegisterDefaultEditors.
00222 #define wxPGRegisterDefaultEditorClass(EDITOR) \
00223 if ( wxPGEditor_##EDITOR == (wxPGEditor*) NULL ) \
00224     { \
00225         wxPGEditor_##EDITOR = wxPropertyGrid::RegisterEditorClass( wxPGConstruct##EDITOR##EditorClass(), TRUE ); \
00226     }
00227 
00228 #define wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_EDITOR(T) \
00229     wxPGRegisterEditorClass(T)

00233 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_SUBTYPE(VALUETYPE,CVALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,TYPESTRING,GETTER,DEFVAL) \
00234 const wxPGValueType *wxPGValueType_##VALUETYPE = (wxPGValueType*) NULL; \
00235 class wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class : public wxPGValueType \
00236 { \
00237 public: \
00238     virtual const wxChar* GetTypeName() const { return TYPESTRING; } \
00239     virtual wxPGVariant GetDefaultValue () const { return wxPGVariant(m_default); } \
00240     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00241     { return wxVariant ( value.GETTER(), name ); } \
00242     virtual wxPGProperty* GenerateProperty ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name ) const \
00243     { \
00244         return wxPG_CONSTFUNC(DEFPROPERTY)(label,name); \
00245     } \
00246     virtual void SetValueFromVariant ( wxPGProperty* property, wxVariant& value ) const \
00247     { \
00248         wxASSERT_MSG( wxStrcmp(GetTypeName(),value.GetType().c_str()) == 0, \
00249             wxT("SetValueFromVariant: wxVariant type mismatch.") ); \
00250         property->DoSetValue(value.GETTER()); \
00251     } \
00252     wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class(); \
00253     virtual ~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class(); \
00254 protected: \
00255     CVALUETYPE m_default; \
00256 }; \
00257 wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class::wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { m_default = DEFVAL; } \
00258 wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class::~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { }
00259 
00260 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,TYPESTRING,GETTER,DEFVAL) \
00261 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_SUBTYPE(VALUETYPE,VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,TYPESTRING,GETTER,DEFVAL)
00262 
00263 //
00264 // Implements wxVariantData for the type.
00265 //
00266 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VDC(VDCLASS,VALUETYPE) \
00267 IMPLEMENT_DYNAMIC_CLASS(VDCLASS,wxVariantData) \
00268 VDCLASS::VDCLASS() { } \
00269 VDCLASS::VDCLASS(const VALUETYPE& value) \
00270 { \
00271     m_value = value; \
00272 } \
00273 void VDCLASS::Copy(wxVariantData& data) \
00274 { \
00275     wxASSERT_MSG( data.GetType() == GetType(), wxT(#VDCLASS) wxT("::Copy: Can't copy to this type of data") ); \
00276     VDCLASS& otherData = (VDCLASS&) data; \
00277     otherData.m_value = m_value; \
00278 } \
00279 wxString VDCLASS::GetType() const \
00280 { \
00281     return wxString(wxT(#VALUETYPE)); \
00282 } \
00283 bool VDCLASS::Eq(wxVariantData& data) const \
00284 { \
00285     wxASSERT_MSG( data.GetType() == GetType(), wxT(#VDCLASS) wxT("::Eq: argument mismatch") ); \
00286     VDCLASS& otherData = (VDCLASS&) data; \
00287     return otherData.m_value == m_value; \
00288 } \
00289 void* VDCLASS::GetValuePtr() { return (void*)&m_value; }
00290 
00291 // TODO: When ready, remove GetValueClassInfo
00292 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_WXOBJ_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00293 class WX_PG_DECLARE_VALUE_TYPE_VDC(VALUETYPE) \
00294     virtual wxClassInfo* GetValueClassInfo(); \
00295 }; \
00296 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VDC(wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE,VALUETYPE) \
00297 wxClassInfo* wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE::GetValueClassInfo() \
00298 { \
00299     return m_value.GetClassInfo(); \
00300 } \
00301 const wxPGValueType *wxPGValueType_##VALUETYPE = (wxPGValueType*) NULL; \
00302 class wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class : public wxPGValueType \
00303 { \
00304 public: \
00305     virtual const wxChar* GetTypeName() const { return CLASSINFO(VALUETYPE)->GetClassName(); } \
00306     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00307     { return wxVariant ( new wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE( (*(VALUETYPE*)value.GetRawPtr()) ), name ); } \
00308     virtual wxPGProperty* GenerateProperty ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name ) const \
00309     { \
00310         return wxPG_CONSTFUNC(DEFPROPERTY)(label,name); \
00311     } \
00312     virtual void SetValueFromVariant ( wxPGProperty* property, wxVariant& value ) const \
00313     { \
00314         const VALUETYPE* real_value; \
00315         wxASSERT_MSG( wxStrcmp(GetTypeName(),value.GetType().c_str()) == 0, \
00316             wxT("GetPtrFromVariant: wxVariant type mismatch.") ); \
00317         wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE* vd = (wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE*)value.GetData(); \
00318         if ( vd->IsKindOf(CLASSINFO(wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE)) ) \
00319             real_value = &vd->GetValue(); \
00320         else \
00321             real_value  = ((const VALUETYPE*)value.GetWxObjectPtr()); \
00322         property->DoSetValue( *real_value ); \
00323     }
00324 
00325 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_WXOBJ(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00326 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_WXOBJ_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00327     virtual wxPGVariant GetDefaultValue () const { return wxPGVariant(DEFVAL); } \
00328 };

00330 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_WXOBJ_OWNDEFAULT(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00331 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_WXOBJ_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00332     wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { m_default = DEFVAL; } \
00333     virtual ~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { } \
00334     virtual wxPGVariant GetDefaultValue () const { return wxPGVariant(&m_default); } \
00335 protected: \
00336     VALUETYPE   m_default; \
00337 };

00341 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00342 const wxPGValueType *wxPGValueType_##VALUETYPE = (wxPGValueType*)NULL; \
00343 class wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class : public wxPGValueType \
00344 { \
00345 protected: \
00346     VALUETYPE   m_default; \
00347 public: \
00348     virtual const wxChar* GetTypeName() const { return wxT(#VALUETYPE); } \
00349     virtual const wxChar* GetCustomTypeName() const { return wxT(#VALUETYPE); } \
00350     virtual wxPGVariant GetDefaultValue () const { return wxPGVariant((void*)&m_default); } \
00351     virtual wxPGProperty* GenerateProperty ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name ) const \
00352     { \
00353         return wxPG_CONSTFUNC(DEFPROPERTY)(label,name); \
00354     } \
00355     virtual void SetValueFromVariant ( wxPGProperty* property, wxVariant& value ) const \
00356     { \
00357         wxASSERT_MSG( wxStrcmp(GetTypeName(),value.GetType().c_str()) == 0, \
00358             wxT("SetValueFromVariant: wxVariant type mismatch.") ); \
00359         wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE* vd = (wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE*)value.GetData(); \
00360         wxASSERT_MSG( vd->IsKindOf(CLASSINFO(wxVariantData_##VALUETYPE)), \
00361             wxT("SetValueFromVariant: wxVariantData mismatch.")); \
00362         property->DoSetValue((void*)&vd->GetValue() ); \
00363     } \
00364     wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { m_default = DEFVAL; } \
00365     virtual ~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { }
00366 
00367 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_SIMPLE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00368 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00369     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00370     { \
00371         void* ptr = (void*)value.GetRawPtr(); \
00372         wxASSERT ( ptr ); \
00373         return wxVariant ( ptr, name ); \
00374     } \
00375 };
00376 
00377 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_CVD(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL,VDCLASS) \
00378 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_VALUE_TYPE_VOIDP_BASE(VALUETYPE,DEFPROPERTY,DEFVAL) \
00379     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00380     { \
00381         void* ptr = (void*)value.GetRawPtr(); \
00382         wxASSERT ( ptr ); \
00383         return wxVariant ( new VDCLASS(*((VALUETYPE*)ptr)), name ); \
00384     } \
00385 };

00394 //
00395 // Use this to create a new type with a different default value.
00396 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_DERIVED_TYPE(VALUETYPE,PARENTVT,DEFVAL) \
00397 const wxPGValueType *wxPGValueType_##VALUETYPE = (wxPGValueType*) NULL; \
00398 class wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class : public wxPGValueType \
00399 { \
00400 protected: \
00401     const wxPGValueType*    m_parentClass; \
00402     PARENTVT                m_default; \
00403 public: \
00404     virtual const wxChar* GetTypeName() const { return m_parentClass->GetTypeName(); } \
00405     virtual const wxChar* GetCustomTypeName() const { return wxT(#VALUETYPE); } \
00406     virtual wxPGVariant GetDefaultValue () const { return wxPGVariant(m_default); } \
00407     virtual wxVariant GenerateVariant ( wxPGVariant value, const wxString& name ) const \
00408     { return m_parentClass->GenerateVariant(value,name); } \
00409     virtual wxPGProperty* GenerateProperty ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name ) const \
00410     { return m_parentClass->GenerateProperty(label,name); } \
00411     virtual void SetValueFromVariant ( wxPGProperty* property, wxVariant& value ) const \
00412     { m_parentClass->SetValueFromVariant(property,value); } \
00413     wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class(); \
00414     virtual ~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class(); \
00415 }; \
00416 wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class::wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() \
00417 { \
00418     m_default = DEFVAL; \
00419     m_parentClass = wxPGValueType_##PARENTVT; \
00420     wxASSERT ( m_parentClass != (wxPGValueType*) NULL); \
00421 } \
00422 wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class::~wxPGValueType##VALUETYPE##Class() { }

00451 // class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG
00452 #define wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY2(CLASSNAME,UPCLASS,T,INTERNAL_T,T_AS_ARG,DECL) \
00453 DECL CLASSNAME : public UPCLASS \
00454 { \
00455     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00456 protected: \
00457     INTERNAL_T      m_value; \
00458 public: \
00459     CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, T_AS_ARG value ); \
00460     virtual ~CLASSNAME();
00461 
00462 #define wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY(NAME,UPCLASS,T,T_AS_ARG) \
00463 wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY2(wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),UPCLASS,T,T,T_AS_ARG,class)
00464 
00465 #define wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY_WITH_DECL(NAME,UPCLASS,T,T_AS_ARG,DECL) \
00466 wxPG_BEGIN_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY2(wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),UPCLASS,T,T,T_AS_ARG,class DECL)
00467 
00468 #define wxPG_END_PROPERTY_CLASS_BODY() \
00469 };

00490 # define wxPG_GETCLASSNAME_IMPLEMENTATION(PROPNAME)

00492 # define wxPG_GETCLASSNAME_IMPLEMENTATION(PROPNAME) \
00493     static const wxChar* PROPNAME##_ClassName = wxT(#PROPNAME); \
00494     const wxChar* PROPNAME##Class::GetClassName() const { return PROPNAME##_ClassName; }

00497 // Implements sans constructor function. Also, first arg is class name, not property name.
00498 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS_PLAIN(PROPNAME,T,EDITOR) \
00499 wxPG_GETCLASSNAME_IMPLEMENTATION(PROPNAME) \
00500 const wxPGValueType* PROPNAME##Class::GetValueType () const \
00501 { \
00502     return wxPGValueType_##T; \
00503 } \
00504 const wxPGEditor* PROPNAME##Class::GetEditorClass () const \
00505 { \
00506     return wxPGEditor_##EDITOR; \
00507 }
00508 
00509 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CLASSINFO(NAME) \
00510 static wxPGProperty* NAME##B (const wxString& label, const wxString& name) \
00511 { \
00512     return wxPG_CONSTFUNC(NAME)(label,name); \
00513 } \
00514 wxPGPropertyClassInfo NAME##ClassInfo = {wxT(#NAME),&NAME##B};
00515 
00516 
00517 // second constfunc and classinfo is for creating properties w/o value from text
00518 // (should be changed to simpler scheme in 1.2)
00519 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CONSTFUNC(NAME,T_AS_ARG) \
00520 wxPGProperty* wxPG_CONSTFUNC(NAME)( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, T_AS_ARG value ) \
00521 { \
00522     return new wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)(label,name,value); \
00523 }
00524 
00525 // Adds constructor function as well.
00526 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS2(NAME,CLASSNAME,T,T_AS_ARG,EDITOR) \
00527 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CONSTFUNC(NAME,T_AS_ARG) \
00528 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CLASSINFO(NAME) \
00529 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS_PLAIN(NAME,T,EDITOR)
00530 
00531 // A regular property
00532 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,T,T_AS_ARG,EDITOR) \
00533 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS2(NAME,wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),T,T_AS_ARG,EDITOR)
00534 
00535 // Derived property class is one that inherits from an existing working property
00536 // class, but assumes same value and editor type.
00537 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_DERIVED_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,T_AS_ARG) \
00538 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CONSTFUNC(NAME,T_AS_ARG) \
00539 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CLASSINFO(NAME) \
00540 wxPG_GETCLASSNAME_IMPLEMENTATION(NAME)

00555   : wxLongStringPropertyClass(name,label,value) \
00556 { } \
00557 wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)::~wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME)() { }

00611 // Implementation for user wxColour editor property
00612 
00613 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY2(NAME,CLASSNAME,LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT) \
00614 class CLASSNAME : public wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxSystemColourProperty) \
00615 { \
00616     WX_DECLARE_DERIVED_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00617 public: \
00618     CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, \
00619         const wxColourPropertyValue& value ); \
00620     virtual ~CLASSNAME (); \
00621     virtual long GetColour ( int index ); \
00622 }; \
00623 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_DERIVED_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,const wxColour&) \
00624 CLASSNAME::CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, \
00625     const wxColourPropertyValue& value ) \
00626     : wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxSystemColourProperty)(label,name,LABELS,VALUES,ITEMCOUNT,value ) \
00627 { \
00628     wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_TYPE(wxColourPropertyValue) \
00629     m_flags |= wxPG_PROP_TRANSLATE_CUSTOM; \
00630     DoSetValue ( &m_value ); \
00631 } \
00632 CLASSNAME::~CLASSNAME () { } \
00633 long CLASSNAME::GetColour ( int index ) \
00634 { \
00635     const wxArrayInt& values = GetValues(); \
00636     if ( !values ) \
00637     { \
00638         wxASSERT ( index < (int)GetCount() ); \
00639         return COLOURS[index); \
00640     } \
00641     return COLOURS[values[index]]; \
00642 }
00643 
00644 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY(NAME,LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT) \
00645     WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY2(NAME,wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT)
00646 
00647 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00648 
00649 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_USES_WXCOLOUR2(NAME,CLASSNAME,LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT) \
00650 class CLASSNAME : public wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxSystemColourProperty) \
00651 { \
00652     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00653 public: \
00654     CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, \
00655         const wxColour& value ); \
00656     virtual ~CLASSNAME (); \
00657     virtual void DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value ); \
00658     virtual wxPGVariant DoGetValue () const; \
00659     virtual long GetColour ( int index ); \
00660 }; \
00661 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS(NAME,wxColour,const wxColour&,Choice) \
00662 CLASSNAME::CLASSNAME( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, const wxColour& value ) \
00663     : wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxSystemColourProperty)(label,name,LABELS,VALUES,ITEMCOUNT,value ) \
00664 { \
00665     wxPG_INIT_REQUIRED_TYPE(wxColour) \
00666     m_flags |= wxPG_PROP_TRANSLATE_CUSTOM; \
00667     DoSetValue(&m_value.m_colour); \
00668 } \
00669 CLASSNAME::~CLASSNAME () { } \
00670 void CLASSNAME::DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value ) \
00671 { \
00672     wxASSERT ( value.GetRawPtr() ); \
00673     wxColour* pval = wxPGVariantToWxObjectPtr(value,wxColour); \
00674     m_value.m_type = wxPG_COLOUR_CUSTOM; \
00675     if ( m_flags & wxPG_PROP_TRANSLATE_CUSTOM ) \
00676     { \
00677         int found_ind = ColToInd(*pval); \
00678         if ( found_ind != wxNOT_FOUND ) m_value.m_type = found_ind; \
00679     } \
00680     m_value.m_colour = *pval; \
00681     wxPG_SetVariantWxObjectValue(); \
00682     if ( m_value.m_type < wxPG_COLOUR_WEB_BASE ) \
00683         wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxEnumProperty)::DoSetValue ( (long)m_value.m_type ); \
00684     else \
00685         m_index = GetItemCount()-1; \
00686 } \
00687 wxPGVariant CLASSNAME::DoGetValue () const \
00688 { \
00689     return wxPGVariant(&m_value.m_colour); \
00690 } \
00691 long CLASSNAME::GetColour ( int index ) \
00692 { \
00693     const wxArrayInt& values = GetValues(); \
00694     if ( !values.GetCount() ) \
00695     { \
00696         wxASSERT ( index < (int)GetItemCount() ); \
00697         return COLOURS[index]; \
00698     } \
00699     return COLOURS[values[index]]; \
00700 }
00701 
00702 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_USES_WXCOLOUR(NAME,LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT) \
00703     WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_USES_WXCOLOUR2(NAME,wxPG_PROPCLASS(NAME),LABELS,VALUES,COLOURS,ITEMCOUNT)

00740 // This provides base for wxEnumPropertyClass and any custom
00741 // "dynamic" enum property classes.
00742 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxBaseEnumPropertyClass : public wxPGProperty
00743 {
00744 public:
00745     wxBaseEnumPropertyClass( const wxString& label, const wxString& name );
00746 
00747     virtual void DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value );
00748     virtual wxPGVariant DoGetValue () const;
00749     virtual wxString GetValueAsString ( int arg_flags ) const;
00750     virtual bool SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int arg_flags );
00751     virtual bool SetValueFromInt ( long value, int arg_flags );
00752 
00753     //
00754     // Additional virtuals
00755 
00756     // This must be overridden to have non-index based value
00757     virtual int GetIndexForValue( int value ) const;
00758 
00759     // This returns string and value for index
00760     // Returns NULL if beyond last item
00761     // pvalue is never NULL - always set it.
00762     virtual const wxString* GetEntry( size_t index, int* pvalue ) const = 0;
00763 
00764 protected:
00765 
00766     int                     m_index;
00767 };

00773 #define wxPG_PROP_STATIC_CHOICES    wxPG_PROP_CLASS_SPECIFIC_1
00774 
00775 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxEnumPropertyClass : public wxBaseEnumPropertyClass // wxPGProperty
00776 {

00778 public:
00779 
00780     wxEnumPropertyClass ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, const wxChar** labels,
00781         const long* values = NULL, unsigned int itemcount = 0, int value = 0 );
00782     wxEnumPropertyClass ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, 
00783         wxPGConstants& constants, int value = 0 );
00784     virtual ~wxEnumPropertyClass ();
00785 
00786     virtual int GetChoiceInfo ( wxPGChoiceInfo* choiceinfo );
00787     virtual int GetIndexForValue( int value ) const;
00788     virtual const wxString* GetEntry( size_t index, int* pvalue ) const;
00789 
00790     inline size_t GetItemCount () const { return m_constants->GetCount(); }
00791     inline const wxArrayInt& GetValues() const { return m_constants->GetValues(); }
00792 
00793     inline wxPGConstants& GetChoices() const { return *m_constants; }
00794 
00795 protected:
00796     wxPGConstants*          m_constants;
00797 };

00871 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00872 
00873 //
00874 // In wxTextCtrl, strings a space delimited C-like strings. For example:
00875 // "String 1" "String 2" "String 3"
00876 //
00877 // To have " in a string, use \".
00878 // To have \ in a string, use \\.
00879 //
00880 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxLongStringPropertyClass : public wxPGProperty
00881 {
00882     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS()
00883 public:
00884 
00885     wxLongStringPropertyClass ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name = wxPG_LABEL, const wxString& value = wxEmptyString );
00886     virtual ~wxLongStringPropertyClass ();
00887 
00888     virtual void DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value );
00889     virtual wxPGVariant DoGetValue () const;
00890     virtual wxString GetValueAsString ( int arg_flags = 0 ) const;
00891     virtual bool SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int flags );
00892     virtual bool OnEvent ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGCtrlClass* wnd_primary, wxEvent& event );
00893 
00894     //  Shows string editor dialog. Value to be edited should be read from value, and
00895     //  if dialog is not cancelled, it should be stored back and TRUE should be returned
00896     //  if that was the case.
00897     virtual bool OnButtonClick ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxString& value );
00898 
00899 protected:
00900     wxString    m_value;
00901 };

00917 
00918     //  Shows string editor dialog. Value to be edited should be read from value, and
00919     //  if dialog is not cancelled, it should be stored back and TRUE should be returned
00920     //  if that was the case.

00932 #define WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_ARRAYSTRING_PROPERTY(PROPNAME,DELIMCHAR,CUSTBUTTXT) \
00933 class wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME) : public wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxArrayStringProperty) \
00934 { \
00935     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS() \
00936 public: \
00937     wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME) ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, const wxArrayString& value ); \
00938     ~wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME) (); \
00939     virtual void GenerateValueAsString (); \
00940     virtual bool SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int ); \
00941     virtual bool OnEvent ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGCtrlClass* primary, wxEvent& event ); \
00942     virtual bool OnCustomStringEdit ( wxWindow* parent, wxString& value ); \
00943 }; \
00944 WX_PG_IMPLEMENT_PROPERTY_CLASS(PROPNAME,wxArrayString,const wxArrayString&,TextCtrlAndButton) \
00945 wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME) ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name, const wxArrayString& value ) \
00946     : wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxArrayStringProperty)(label,name,value) \
00947 { \
00948 } \
00949 wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::~wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)() { } \
00950 void wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::GenerateValueAsString () \
00951 { \
00952     wxChar delim_char = DELIMCHAR; \
00953     if ( delim_char == wxT('"') ) \
00954         wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxArrayStringProperty)::GenerateValueAsString(); \
00955     else \
00956         wxPropertyGrid::ArrayStringToString(m_display,m_value,0,DELIMCHAR,0); \
00957 } \
00958 bool wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int ) \
00959 { \
00960     wxChar delim_char = DELIMCHAR; \
00961     if ( delim_char == wxT('"') ) \
00962         return wxPG_PROPCLASS(wxArrayStringProperty)::SetValueFromString(text,0); \
00963     \
00964     m_value.Empty(); \
00965     WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_BEGIN(text,DELIMCHAR) \
00966         m_value.Add ( token ); \
00967     WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_END() \
00968     GenerateValueAsString(); \
00969     return TRUE; \
00970 } \
00971 bool wxPG_PROPCLASS(PROPNAME)::OnEvent ( wxPropertyGrid* propgrid, wxPGCtrlClass* primary, wxEvent& event ) \
00972 { \
00973     if ( event.GetEventType() == wxEVT_COMMAND_BUTTON_CLICKED ) \
00974         return OnButtonClick(propgrid,primary,(const wxChar*) CUSTBUTTXT); \
00975     return FALSE; \
00976 }

01113 
01114 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
01115 
01116 //
01117 // Tokenizer macros.
01118 // NOTE: I have made two versions - worse ones (performance and consistency
01119 //   wise) use wxStringTokenizer and better ones (may have unfound bugs)
01120 //   use custom code.
01121 //
01122 
01123 #include <wx/tokenzr.h>
01124 
01125 // TOKENIZER1 can be done with wxStringTokenizer
01126 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01127     wxStringTokenizer tkz(WXSTRING,DELIMITER,wxTOKEN_RET_EMPTY); \
01128     while ( tkz.HasMoreTokens() ) \
01129     { \
01130         wxString token = tkz.GetNextToken(); \
01131         token.Trim(TRUE); \
01132         token.Trim(FALSE);
01133 
01134 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_END() \
01135     }
01136 
01137 
01138 /*#define WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01139     const wxChar* ptr = WXSTRING.c_str(); \
01140     wxString token; \
01141     const wxChar* token_start = NULL; \
01142     wxChar a = 0; \
01143     do \
01144     { \
01145         a = *ptr; \
01146         while ( a == ' ' ) { ptr++; a = *ptr; } \
01147         token_start = ptr; \
01148         while ( a != DELIMITER && a != 0 ) { ptr++; a = *ptr; } \
01149         if ( ptr > token_start ) \
01150         { \
01151             unsigned int str_len = ptr-token_start; \
01152             wxChar* store_ptr = token.GetWriteBuf ( str_len+1 ); \
01153             wxTmemcpy ( store_ptr, token_start, str_len ); \
01154             store_ptr[str_len] = 0; \
01155             token.UngetWriteBuf ( str_len ); \
01156             token.Trim(); \
01157         } \
01158         else \
01159             token.Empty();
01160 
01161 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER1_END() \
01162         ptr++; \
01163     } while ( a );*/
01164 
01165 /*
01166 
01167 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01168     wxStringTokenizer tkz(WXSTRING,DELIMITER,wxTOKEN_RET_EMPTY); \
01169     int phase = 0; \
01170     while ( tkz.HasMoreTokens() ) \
01171     { \
01172         wxString token = tkz.GetNextToken(); \
01173         if ( phase != 0 ) \
01174         {
01175 
01176 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_END() \
01177             phase = -1; \
01178         } \
01179         phase += 1; \
01180     }

01183 
01184 //
01185 // 2nd version: tokens are surrounded by DELIMITERs (for example, C-style strings).
01186 // TOKENIZER2 must use custom code (a class) for full compliancy
01187 // with " surrounded strings with \" inside.
01188 //
01189 // class implementation is in propgrid.cpp
01190 //
01191 
01192 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxPGStringTokenizer
01193 {
01194 public:
01195     wxPGStringTokenizer( const wxString& str, wxChar delimeter );
01196     ~wxPGStringTokenizer();
01197 
01198     bool HasMoreTokens(); // not const so we can do some stuff in it
01199     wxString GetNextToken();
01200 
01201 protected:
01202 
01203     const wxString* m_str;
01204     const wxChar*   m_curPos;
01205 #if wxUSE_STL
01206     //wxString        m_buffer;
01207 #endif
01208     wxString        m_readyToken;
01209     wxChar          m_delimeter;
01210 };
01211 
01212 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01213     wxPGStringTokenizer tkz(WXSTRING,DELIMITER); \
01214     while ( tkz.HasMoreTokens() ) \
01215     { \
01216         wxString token = tkz.GetNextToken(); \
01217 
01218 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_END() \
01219     }
01220 
01221 /*
01222 #if wxUSE_STL
01223 
01224 // 2nd version: tokens are surrounded by DELIMITERs (for example, C-style strings).
01225 // TOKENIZER2 must use custom code for full compliancy
01226 // with " surrounded strings with \" inside.
01227 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01228     const wxChar* ptr = WXSTRING.c_str(); \
01229     wxString token; \
01230     wxStringBuffer strbuf(token,2048); \
01231     wxChar* store_ptr_start = NULL; \
01232     wxChar* store_ptr = NULL; \
01233     wxChar a = *ptr; \
01234     wxChar prev_a = 0; \
01235     while ( a ) \
01236     { \
01237         if ( !store_ptr_start ) \
01238         { \
01239             if ( a == DELIMITER ) \
01240             { \
01241                 store_ptr_start = store_ptr = strbuf; \
01242                 prev_a = 0; \
01243             } \
01244         } \
01245         else \
01246         { \
01247             if ( prev_a != wxT('\\') ) \
01248             { \
01249                 if ( a != DELIMITER ) \
01250                 { \
01251                     if ( a != wxT('\\') ) \
01252                     { \
01253                         *store_ptr = a; \
01254                         store_ptr++; \
01255                     } \
01256                 } \
01257                 else \
01258                 { \
01259                     *store_ptr = 0; \
01260                     wxASSERT ( (store_ptr-store_ptr_start) < 2048 );
01261 
01262 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_END() \
01263                     store_ptr_start = NULL; \
01264                 } \
01265                 prev_a = a; \
01266             } \
01267             else \
01268             { \
01269                 *store_ptr = a; \
01270                 store_ptr++; \
01271                 prev_a = 0; \
01272             } \
01273         } \
01274         ptr++; \
01275         a = *ptr; \
01276     }
01277 
01278 
01279 #else // wxUSE_STL
01280 
01281 //
01282 // NON USE_STL COMPLIANT VERSION
01283 //
01284 // 2nd version: tokens are surrounded by DELIMITERs (for example, C-style strings).
01285 // TOKENIZER2 must use custom code for full compliancy
01286 // with " surrounded strings with \" inside.
01287 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_BEGIN(WXSTRING,DELIMITER) \
01288     const wxChar* ptr = WXSTRING.c_str(); \
01289     const wxChar* ptr_end = &ptr[WXSTRING.length()]; \
01290     wxString token; \
01291     wxChar* store_ptr_start = NULL; \
01292     wxChar* store_ptr = NULL; \
01293     wxChar a = *ptr; \
01294     wxChar prev_a = 0; \
01295     while ( a ) \
01296     { \
01297         if ( !store_ptr_start ) \
01298         { \
01299             if ( a == DELIMITER ) \
01300             { \
01301                 store_ptr_start = store_ptr = token.GetWriteBuf ( ptr_end-ptr+1 ); \
01302                 prev_a = 0; \
01303             } \
01304         } \
01305         else \
01306         { \
01307             if ( prev_a != wxT('\\') ) \
01308             { \
01309                 if ( a != DELIMITER ) \
01310                 { \
01311                     if ( a != wxT('\\') ) \
01312                     { \
01313                         *store_ptr = a; \
01314                         store_ptr++; \
01315                     } \
01316                 } \
01317                 else \
01318                 { \
01319                     *store_ptr = 0; \
01320                     token.UngetWriteBuf ( store_ptr-store_ptr_start ); \
01321 
01322 #define WX_PG_TOKENIZER2_END() \
01323                     store_ptr_start = NULL; \
01324                 } \
01325                 prev_a = a; \
01326             } \
01327             else \
01328             { \
01329                 *store_ptr = a; \
01330                 store_ptr++; \
01331                 prev_a = 0; \
01332             } \
01333         } \
01334         ptr++; \
01335         a = *ptr; \
01336     } \
01337     if ( store_ptr_start ) \
01338         token.UngetWriteBuf ( store_ptr-store_ptr_start );
01339 
01340 #endif // !wxUSE_STL
01341 
01342 */
